name: Sauced: Mojo Sauce
description: Ever since discovering Mojo sauce as the "secret" ingredient to one of my favorite rotisserie chickens, I've been all over this stuff. As a marinade, baste, or dip, this pungent, acidic sauce packs a massive amount of flavor.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup fresh sour orange juice, or 1/3 cup of fresh orange juice and 1/3 cup of fresh lime juice
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place garlic in a mortar and pestle. Add 1/2 teaspoon of salt and work into a smooth paste.
In a small bowl, whisk together garlic, sour orange juice, oil, oregano, cumin. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
